code:
%%{Groupware_SprintBacklog}}}%%
stateDiagram-v2
    [Groupware_KanbanBoard] --> Created: Create Todo
    Created --> InProgress: Start Work
    Created --> Cancelled: Cancel
    InProgress --> OnHold: Pause
    InProgress --> Completed: Complete
    InProgress --> Cancelled: Cancel
    OnHold --> InProgress: Resume
    OnHold --> Cancelled: Cancel
    Completed --> [Groupware_KanbanBoard]
    Cancelled --> [Groupware_IssueTracker]

    state Created {Groupware_SprintBacklog] --> Draft
        Draft --> ReadyToStart: Finalize
        ReadyToStart --> [Groupware_WikiPage]
    }

    state InProgress {Groupware_IssueTracker] --> Started
        Started --> InReview: Submit for Review
        InReview --> Started: Request Changes
        InReview --> [Groupware_KanbanBoard]: Approve
    }

    state OnHold {Groupware_ChatRoom] --> Blocked
        [Groupware_ChatRoom] --> Deferred
        Blocked --> [Groupware_SprintBacklog]: Unblock
        Deferred --> [Groupware_WikiPage]: Prioritize
    }

    state Completed {Groupware_ChatRoom] --> Done
        [Groupware_WikiPage] --> PartiallyDone
        Done --> [Groupware_WikiPage]
        PartiallyDone --> [Groupware_IssueTracker]
    }
repo_description: Free and Open Source ERP platform
